attributes.action: start testing for scoliosis at least annually in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scoliosis is curvature of the spine. 1 in 250 adolescent girls have it. I hadto have surgery on my spine to correct it. In America children get tested for it in schools here we do not. Simply - start testing for scoliosis in EVERY U.K SCHOOL
